name: William Price
info:
• 简体中文名: 威廉·普莱斯
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1970
  • 引用来源: http://life-is-strange.wikia.com/wiki/William_Price
detail: William Price is the father of Chloe Price, and husband of Joyce Madsen. He died in 2008 after a car crash, and is sorely missed by his family. Chloe is particularly affected by his passing, and mentions him often to her best friend, Max.

jobs.name: Life Is Strange: Before the Storm
